data.title: Intasure on LinkedIn: #insuranceexperience #movopartnerships #propertyinsurancespecialists
data.meta_description:
Introducing Andy Bird, who will be attending this year's MOVO conference alongside Nick Grant.

Andy is one of our Strategic Account Directors and has…
data.text:
Do your clients own or are they considering buying a holiday home or an additional property for frequent visits? With holiday home insurance your clients' property can benefit from added protection against damage, theft and other risks. Whether it’s for weekends away with the family or a base for friends to stop-by, second homes open up opportunities such as second income from letting out the property during unoccupied periods. However, they may also want to consider putting suitable safeguards in place for their property. At Intasure, we offer holiday home insurance in the UK and across 19 countries throughout the EU and beyond. Speak to us about securing cover for a variety of property types – from luxury villas to apartments, barns, and chalets for your client. Contact us to find out more by speaking to our business development team by emailing us at brokerteam@intasure.com or calling 01892 239 370. #holidayhomeinsurance #secondproperties #propertyspecialists

If your client owns a holiday home abroad and it is unoccupied for long periods, they may be concerned about how secure it is. There are several ways of potentially minimising the risk of burglaries or serious damage. The best way to help prevent potential burglars or squatters is to ensure the property is secured, by ensuring that there are adequate heavy-duty locks on doors, windows, and gates. If the property has window shutters, your clients should make sure they are closed and locked securely while they are away. To learn more, speak to our business development team by emailing us at brokerteam@intasure.com #squatters #propertyinsurance #unoccupiedproperties

Do you have clients who are preparing to leave a property unoccupied? Are they aware of the steps they could take to reduce the risk of damage to the property during the period it is being left unoccupied? According to the Office for National Statistics, 89.7% of the unoccupied dwellings recorded in England are truly vacant and 10.3% are second properties with no permanent resident. We outlined tips on how to safeguard an empty property and ensure your client’s property is safe and secure. To read the full article click below. #UnoccupiedProperty #PropertyInsurance #ThoughtLeadership Source: https://lnkd.in/eSmvr93E

Last week, Nick Grant, Shauna Morlese,Louise Carr and some of our broker partners attended BIBA East Midlands & Nottingham Insurance Institute ‘Seeing Beyond the Label’ wine tasting experience at Bar Esquina in Nottingham. We were proud to be sponsors for the event and it was wonderful to meet and network with all the brokers and BIBA partners in attendance. If you would like to connect with our BDM’s, please contact them using the following details: Nick Grant – Nick_grant@ajg.com Shauna Morlese – Shauna_Morlese@ajg.com Lousie Carr – Louise_Carr@ajg.com #Winetasting #networking #BIBAscheme

Introducing Vic, Sales and Renewals Consultant in our Wholesale team. Did you know that Vic has been a valuable member of our team for nearly 4 years now? There's more to Vic than just insurance. Check out 4 fun facts to get to know her better: 1. She lived and worked in Australia for a year! During her time living across the world she travelled around the country living out of a van and exploring the beautiful landscapes of Australia. Next on her travel bucket list? South Korea! 🛫 2. When Vic isn't busy insuring your client’s properties, she's rocking out to classic tunes. 🎸 The Rolling Stones and Fleetwood Mac are just a couple of her favourite bands. 🎶 3. Vic is a HUGE Formula 1 fan, with Red Bull being her favourite team! 🏎️ She's even been lucky enough to attend a few races, with Spa in Belgium being her absolute favourite. 🏁 4. Vic has a massive love of dogs, she is the owner of Yala, a 13 year old Labradoodle who has even visited the office a few times! So, if you're looking for a sales and renewals consultant who's well-travelled, music-loving, a Formula 1 enthusiast, and a dog lover, look no further than Vic from our Wholesale team! Call 01892 239370 or email our team at brokerteam@Intasure.com today!

Our business development team operates across the UK Local support, strategically placed around UK to be there when you need us… If you're unsure about the best team member to contact regarding your client's policies, we've got you covered! Take a look at our map to find the contact details of the dedicated Business Development Manager (BDM) in your region: 🏴 Samantha Miles - Northern Ireland 🏴 Shauna Morlese - North East & Scotland 🏴 Michael Czekalskyj - North West & Wales 🏴 Louise Carr - Midlands 🏴 Ben Franklin - East Anglia & London 🏴 Nick Grant - London & South East 🏴 Carl W. - South & South West Reach out to the BDM for your area to get specialist support for placing your client's policies. #propertyinsurance #BDMteam
